page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JOANNE.
page.content: The first thing I do is go to the toilet and swill my face with water.I open my curtains and then get my clothes out.When I am off school I put my old playing out trousers and jumpers on.Mam gives me corn flake cereal for breakfast and orange juice while I watch TV.I put my shoes and coat on and go to my nana's on the number 6 bus,she lives near King Oswy shops.My cousin Stephen was there.We looked for lady birds I walked him round to the bus stop with his mam.My fare home was 11p.Our tea was chops,chips,and noodle doodles.Later my friends and I went down Ann's shop.I got some Coca Cola and then we played wall ball and space invaders.I had toast for supper and watched TV.It was Coronation Street.My mam locked all the doors and we went to bed.
